titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Sigma Alpha Epsilon: 1965-1970 Class Reunion Biographies SCM0329
Sigma Alpha Epsilon: 1965-1970 Class Reunion Biographies
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Dept. of Special Collections University Archives

note.p: This encoded finding aid is compliant with Stanford EAD Best Practice Guidelines, Version 1.0.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2012-09-07T10:21-0700

did.unittitle: Sigma Alpha Epsilon: 1965-1970 class reunion biographies

repository.corpname: Dept. of Special Collections University Archives

did.abstract: Collection consists of biographies contributed by Sigma Alpha Epsilon members from the classes of 1965-1970. They were compiled for distribution at Sigma Alpha Epsilon reunion held in 2008.

physdesc.label: General Physical Description note
physdesc.extent: 1 folder Sigma Alpha Epsilon biographies from 1965-1970 class reunion, printed from an email forwarded by Maggie Kimball on 10/26/2008. 66 printed pages.

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Sigma Alpha Epsilon: 1965-1970 Class Reunion Biographies (SCM0329). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: The California Alpha chapter of the Sigma Alpha Epsilon fraternity was founded at Stanford University on March 5, 1892.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of biographies contributed by Sigma Alpha Epsilon members from the classes of 1965-1970. They were compiled for distribution at Sigma Alpha Epsilon reunion held in 2008.
